articles.title: Susie Wiles: Who is Trump’s new chief of staff? - BBC.com
articles.description: The 67-year-old - whose father was an American football star - will be the first woman in the job.
articles.content:
US President-elect Donald Trump has announced his campaign manager, Susan Summerall Wiles, will serve as his White House chief of staff when he takes over the presidency next year.
In a statement, T… [+3184 chars]
